info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 10 at 1:19AM MST until February 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts over 40 mph. Waves of over 2 feet will be possible at times on Lake Mohave. * WHERE...In Arizona, Bullhead City, Lake Havasu, Lake Mohave, and the Mohave Valley. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley including Needles. In Nevada, Laughlin and Lake Mohave. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts and high wave activity on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Occasional blowing dust will be possible with highest gusts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized wind gusts over 50 mph will be possible through the morning hours for Laughlin and Bullhead City. This could result in some minor structural damage or downed power lines.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
